name: Chain Of Thought 2 - Pyramid Power
description:
****
We've just launched our newest word game "Cartoonacy - The Game of Visual Puns!" Please help us celebrate by downloading "Cartoonacy" today!
****

"If you liked Chain Of Thought, you're gonna love Chain Of Thought 2: Pyramid Power!"

Each puzzle is a journey for the mind. Travel from "Light->Saber" to "Saber->Tooth" to "Tooth->Fairy."

And now in Pyramid Power, you can even link a word to more than one answer.

Cat->Woman
Cat->Scan
Cat->Nap

Pyramid Power takes word association in a whole new direction.

Can you chain all the words together and unleash the power of the Pyramid?

FEATURES:

*Challenging puzzles
*Pop culture trivia
*Easy to learn
*Solo Play
*Pass 'N Play against your family on a single device
*Online Play against your friends
*Tons of achievements
*Multiple leaderboards
*Unlimited free hints
